00003 #include <iostream.h>
00004 
00005 
00006 #include "RoboticPlatform.hpp"
00007 #include "ObjectManager.hpp"
00008 #include "Puma560.hpp"
00009   
00010   
00011   
00012 int main(int argc, char *argv[])
00013 {
00014     RoboticPlatform::init(argc, argv);
00015     RoboticPlatform::setExitOnlyWhenAllWindowsClosedOn();
00016     
00017     ObjectManager om;
00018     Manipulator *manipulator;
00019 
00020     CmdLineArgs *commandLine = RoboticPlatform::getCommandLineArguments();  
00021     if (commandLine->isOption("m"))
00022     {
00023         manipulator = om.createDerivedObject<Manipulator>(
00024             commandLine->getStringOption("m"));
00025     }
00026     else
00027         manipulator = om.createDerivedObject<Manipulator>();
00028     
00029     if (om.d_status.isStatusError())
00030     {
00031         cout << om.d_status.getMessageText() << endl;
00032         return -1;
00033     }
00034 
00035     manipulator->d_objectStatus.setStatusOk();
00036 
00037     manipulator->setSimulationModeOff();  
00038     manipulator->setTeachModeOn(); // removes servo controller
00039     manipulator->enableArmPower();
00040     
00041     while(1)
00042     {
00043         delay (1);
00044     }
00045         
00046     return 0;
00047 }
